item.title: The STAIR lab at William & Mary
item.description: STAIR Lab (Systematic Text Analysis for International Relations) STAIR Lab is a computational social science lab conducting collaborative research with undergraduate students at William & Mary. We use natural language processing (NLP) tools to study how politicians and the media (both traditional and social media) think and talk about international issues, with a particular focus on international humanitarian questions. Lab website Click on the link below to go to the lab website
